pinyin: zhen4 wang2 zhan4 shi4 ji4 nian4 ri4

definition: disposition of troops/wave/spate/burst/spell/short period of time/classifier for events or states of short duration
to die/to lose/to be gone/to flee/deceased
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker

to read/to study (a subject)/to attend (a school)/to read aloud/to give (sb) a tongue-lashing (CL:頓|顿[dun4])/to miss (sb)/idea/remembrance/twenty (banker's anti-fraud numeral corresponding to 廿[nian4])
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
